snippet.title: The Typing of the Dead 2 (PC) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of Sega's 2008 zombie-fueled touch-typing battle game for Windows PCs, The Typing of the Dead 2. 

This Japanese-exclusive PC port is the sole home version of the arcade game, a typing tutor-style remake of House of the Dead III. It is the sequel to The Typing of the Dead (which was based on HotD 2), if you were wondering why the numbers don't match up between the series.

I also do a quick demonstration of the battle game modes, beginning at 58:08.
_______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
